segments.text: Morning , Meg . You look not well today ? Are you ill ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then , What â€™ s the matter with you my child ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , come on , baby . Tell me what happened .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ... I failed to pass the examination . How I wish I had studied hard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . Take it easy . You can set your aim from today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , Mum . I will not fail the examination next time .
segments.speaker: S1
